item.description:
The Barn Pub & Grille, originally built as the town's livery stable, is located on Ring Street across from Amesbury's last railroad station. Since it's construction, this old barn has been home to many different businesses including Worthen Manufacturing, a manufacturer of carriages back in the mid-1800's.

Conveniently located near the Pow Wow River Walk. Parking is available on the Water Street parking deck.

They have a great menu that has a little bit of everything on it.  Check out their menu here:    http://www.thebarnpub.com/barn2011.pdf and their Gluten Free menu here:   http://www.thebarnpub.com/glutenfreemenu2011.pdf .

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

I have this event scheduled this event on 2 of my Meetup groups, so if you see more people at the event then you expect that is the reason.

 

I look forward to seeing you at this event.

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs, come on in and meet us up there.
item.name: Let's grab dinner
